name: Finding 21
description:
Finding 21 is a puzzle game that explores the possibility of adding screen lock in a maze game. Gather all the flags in 40+ puzzles!

Screen lock

If you press the space bar, the screen won't move with the character.

Keys and Grey area

When you acquire a key, you gain the ability to erase walls of the same color as the key. When you enter the gray area, the screen fixation function becomes unavailable.
